doi-housing-improvement-program.title: Housing Improvement Program
doi-housing-improvement-program.headline: Housing Improvement Program
doi-housing-improvement-program.summary: The Housing Improvement Program (HIP) is a home repair, renovation, replacement and new housing grant program available to American Indians and Alaska Native (AI/AN) individuals and families who have no immediate resource for standard housing.
doi-housing-improvement-program.eligibil: You are a member of a federally recognized American Indian Tribe or an Alaska Native.
